sn23.4:1.2: Ayasma radho yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam radham bhagava etadavoca:
sn23.4:2.1: “Parinneyye ca, radha, dhamme desessami parinnanca parinnatavim puggalanca.
sn23.4:2.2: Tam sunahi, sadhukam manasi karohi; bhasissami”ti.
sn23.4:2.3: “Evam, bhante”ti kho ayasma radho bhagavato paccassosi.
sn23.4:2.6: Rupam kho, radha, parinneyyo dhammo, vedana parinneyyo dhammo, sanna parinneyyo dhammo, sankhara parinneyyo dhammo, vinnanam parinneyyo dhammo.
sn23.4:2.9: Yo kho, radha, ragakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo—
